question:
Who of the following started the Home Rule Movement?
1. Bal Gangadhar Tilak
2. Bipin Chandra Pal
3. Annie Besant
4. Lala Lajpat Roy
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The main purpose of the Home Rule Movement was to re-energize the national movement. Bal Gangadhar Tilak established the Home Rule League in the year 1916 (April) at Poona. Annie Besant established the Home Rule League in the year 1916 (September) at Adyar (Near Madras). Annie Besant received inspiration from the Irish Home Rule movement.
